title: Coordinating with parental authority while maintaining grandparent role
description: Coordinating with parental authority while maintaining grandparent role
content:
Scenario: Coordinating with parental authority while maintaining grandparent role
    Given Sarah is the parent with primary authority over children
    And Margaret needs to honor Sarah's parenting choices
    When the family_elohim coordinates care boundaries
    Then it should help Margaret align with Sarah's values and rules
    And it should preserve Margaret's unique grandparent identity
    And it should navigate between parental authority and grandparent autonomy
    And Margaret should not be subordinate (taking orders) or superior (overriding choices)
    And family_elohim should help them work as partners in child-rearing
    And relationship should be mutually respectful and collaborative
    And complex multigenerational dynamics should be coordinated skillfully
